full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I RJES GNANG BCU GSUM JI LTAR BYA TSUL SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @134B CES DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I' RJES GNANG BCU GSUM JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL CHA TSANG LA GO BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, KHA CHE'I PAndI TA CHEN PO SH'AKYA'I SHR'I'I @135A *, ,GDAN SA PA MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA LA MI 'JIGS PA'I SPOBS PA DGE BA CAN CHOS RJE RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN DANG, MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHOS MDZAD DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG MKHAS BTZUN GYIS, YANG NAS YANG DU NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DRUG PA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO PAn MKHYEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO @135B GNYIS KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS YIG CHA MANG PA'I GSUNG SGRIGS BLA MA GONG MA'I ZHAL SHES DANG PHYAG LEN GYI MAN NGAG GIS BRGYAN TE SHIN TU GSAL BAR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA 'DI LA, BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS BZODPAR BZHES NAS, BDAG LA SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,CES PA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG DON GRUB PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,
